extendedInfo.description: Picture gallery for aircraft enthusiasts!U.S. Air Force photos of the stealth bomber Lockheed F-117 Nighthawk, airborne and on the ground.You can set the images as wallpaper and downoad high resolution versions from the internet.Themes: F-117, F117, Military aircraft, aeroplanes, airplanes, stealth technology, U.S.A.F., USAF, U.S.A., USA, United States of America, Department of Defense, strategic air command, nuclear bomber, wallpaper, gratis background images, free picsFEATURES:* Options menu  + Help page  + Settings page    - Text color    - Background color    - Text size    - Text padding    - Reset  + Link to all iwpSoftware apps     in Android Market  + Go to bookmark  + Set bookmark  + Set current image as wallpaper  + Link to image/item/description* General features  + English and German     program language  + Contents rotate     (portrait/landscape)  + Fullscreen images     on/off by long clickDo you like this app?Please rate it!Your feedback via e-mail is welcome!NOTE:If you meet problems or feel the need of some features you consider important, please contact us via e-mail before leaving a bad review.HAVE FUN!
